name: LOGIC
description: LOGIC is a smart contract (BSC BEP-20) & crypto currency platform that decentralizes global trade and transportation(Business token). It will optimize interactions between traders, freight forwarders, ship owners, booking agents, road, rail, air and logistics payment providers, as well as other parties involved in international trade. With the platform, users will have access to a well-balanced eco-system based on cutting edge crypto security and frictionless interactions. Itâ€™s purpose is to facilitate a seamless exchange of trade & cargo documents and payment options in real time at low cost. Security, transparency, accountability, and traceability are the pillars of the platform architecture. When you choose LOGIC as a payment term you are able to know the live location of your cargo very easily.
